DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; ANOTHER BROKEN CAMPAIGN PROMISE
DOC.TEXT: Italian Premier Silvio Berlusconi , who owns the Italian league championship team , AC Milan , says he probably will not attend Sunday ' s World Cup championship game . Berlusconi has cited numerous governmental duties , including several out-of-town trips . He had promised he would attend the final if Italy advanced to the game . CHRIS DUFRESNE
